bwwExcerpt: J. Peter Bergman, The Berkshire Edge: Leo and Lucille are respectively played by Max Chernin and Talia Suskauer. They are a handsome couple, and Suskauer has a special voice that she uses for the dramatic effect that defines Lucille Frank. Particularly in the second act when she sings her aria, “Do It Alone,” and the duet with Chernin, “This is Not Over Yet,” her voice and her dramatic ability are riveting. Chernin is her vocal mate, although his character is calmer and more complacent, and this
